In environment fn : nat -> R -> R f : R -> R x : R r : posreal H : forall y : R, Boule x r y -> f y = Lim_seq (fun n : nat => fn n y) H7 : CVU_dom fn (Boule x r) eps : R H8 : 0 < eps Unable to unify "CVU_dom fn (Boule x r)" with "exists N : nat, forall (n : nat) (y : R), (N <= n)%nat -> Boule x r y -> Rabs (f y - fn n y) < eps".

original: intros fn f x r H1. split. - intros H2 eps H3. destruct (CVU fn f x r H1 eps H3) as [N H4]. intros n y H5 H6. apply H4; auto. - intros H7 eps H8. apply H7.
